assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Institutional ethical approval was obtained (UICISA: E-Ref. AD P595-5/2019). All procedures were in accordance with the national ethical standards and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5). Informed consent was obtained from all participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
